short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily highlight and copy cleaned text content from web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clean Content Copier is a handy Chrome extension designed to streamline the process of copying text content from web pages. With a simple click, activate the highlight mode to visually mark elements by hovering over them. Clicking on any highlighted element copies its cleaned text content directly to your clipboard, ensuring you get only the relevant information making easier to use the content.
